description: This table contains all gene fusion mutation data from the current release.

fields.name: SAMPLE_ID
fields.description: A sample is an instance of a portion of a tumour being examined for mutations. The sample name can be derived from a number of sources. In many cases it originates from the cell line name. Other sources include names assigned by the annotators, or an incremented number assigned during an anonymisation process. A number of samples can be taken from a single tumour and a number of tumours can be obtained from one individual. A sample id is used to identify a sample within the COSMIC database. There can be multiple ids, if the same sample has been entered into the database multiple times from different papers.

fields.name: SAMPLE_NAME
fields.description: (See description for Sample_ID field)

fields.name: PRIMARY_SITE
fields.description: The primary tissue/cancer from which the sample originated. More details on the tissue classification are avaliable from http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/classification. In COSMIC we have standard classification system for tissue types and sub types because they vary a lot between different papers.

fields.name: SITE_SUBTYPE_1
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 1) of the samples tissue of origin.

fields.name: SITE_SUBTYPE_2
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 2) of the samples tissue of origin.

fields.name: SITE_SUBTYPE_3
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 3) of the samples tissue of origin.

fields.name: PRIMARY_HISTOLOGY
fields.description: The histological classification of the sample.

fields.name: HISTOLOGY_SUBTYPE_1
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 1) of the sample.

fields.name: HISTOLOGY_SUBTYPE_2
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 2) of the sample.

fields.name: HISTOLOGY_SUBTYPE_3
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 3) of the sample.

fields.name: FUSION_ID
fields.description: Unique fusion mutation identifier.

fields.name: TRANSLOCATION_NAME
fields.description: Syntax describing the portions of mRNA present (in HGVS 'r.' format) from each gene (allows representation of UTR sequences).

fields.name: FUSION_TYPE
fields.description: Type of mutation.

fields.name: TRANSLOCATION_NAME
fields.description: Syntax describing the portions of mRNA present (in HGVS 'r.' format) from each gene (allows representation of UTR sequences).

fields.name: FIVE_PRIME_CHROMOSOME
fields.description: Chromosome of 5' gene.

fields.name: FIVE_PRIME_STRAND
fields.description: The orientation of the 5' gene (+/-).

fields.name: FIVE_PRIME_GENE_ID
fields.description: The transcript identifier of the 5' gene.

fields.name: FIVE_PRIME_GENE_NAME
fields.description: The transcript identifier of the 5' gene.

fields.name: FIVE_PRIME_OBSERVED_EXON
fields.description: Last observed exon number of the 5' gene fusion partner.

fields.name: FIVE_PRIME_GENOME_START_FROM
fields.description: The genomic coordinate of the start (+ strand)/breakpoint (- strand) of the 5' fusion gene as described in the Translocation Name.

fields.name: FIVE_PRIME_GENOME_START_TO
fields.description: The range of genomic coordinates of the start (+ strand)/breakpoint (- strand) of the 5' fusion gene if it is an unknown base position.

fields.name: FIVE_PRIME_GENOME_STOP_FROM
fields.description: The genomic coordinate of the breakpoint (+ strand)/start (- strand) of the 5' fusion gene as described in the Translocation Name.

fields.name: FIVE_PRIME_GENOME_STOP_TO
fields.description: The range of genomic coordinates of the breakpoint (+ strand)/start (- strand) of the 5' fusion gene if it is an unknown base position.

fields.name: THREE_PRIME_CHROMOSOME
fields.description: Chromosome of 3' gene.

fields.name: THREE_PRIME_STRAND
fields.description: The orientation of the 3' gene (+/-).

fields.name: THREE_PRIME_GENE_ID
fields.description: The transcript identifier of the 3' gene.

fields.name: THREE_PRIME_GENE_NAME
fields.description: The transcript identifier of the 3' gene.

fields.name: THREE_PRIME_FIRST_OBSERVED_EXON
fields.description: First observed exon number of the 3' gene fusion partner.

fields.name: THREE_PRIME_GENOME_START_FROM
fields.description: The genomic coordinate of the start (+ strand)/breakpoint (- strand) of the 3' fusion gene as described in the Translocation Name.

fields.name: THREE_PRIME_GENOME_START_TO
fields.description: The range of genomic coordinates of the start (+ strand)/breakpoint (- strand) of the 3' fusion gene if it is an unknown base position.

fields.name: THREE_PRIME_GENOME_STOP_FROM
fields.description: The genomic coordinate of the breakpoint (+ strand)/start (- strand) of the 3' fusion gene as described in the Translocation Name.

fields.name: THREE_PRIME_GENOME_STOP_TO
fields.description: The range of genomic coordinates of the breakpoint (+ strand)/start (- strand) of the 3' fusion gene if it is an unknown base position.

fields.name: FUSION_TYPE
fields.description: Type of mutation.

fields.name: PUBMED_PMID
fields.description: The PUBMED ID for the paper that the sample was noted in.
